examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/authenticate \
  -H "X-Api-Token: bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w"

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/authenticate \
  -H "X-Api-Token: bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w" \
  -d client[email]=larry@dronebase.com \
  -d client[password]=hard_password

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
    first_name: "Jim",
    last_name: "Jam",
    email: "jimjam@me.com"
    token: "qEXrMhCVQu_9JhfeZv7McFTJAww"
    type: "client"
  }

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients \
  -H "X-Api-Token: bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w"

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients \
  -H "X-Api-Token: bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w" \
  -d client[first_name]=Larry \
  -d client[last_name]=Sprock \
  -d client[email]=larry@dronebase.com \
  -d client[password]=hard_password

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
    first_name: "Jim",
    last_name: "Jam",
    email: "jimjam@me.com"
    token: "qEXrMhCVQu_9JhfeZv7McFTJAww"
  }

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients/credit_cards \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com"

Parameter.description: A credit card token provided by our payment processor.

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com" \
  -d provider_token=tok_15zAxJJo202eeWudho4BMMoM

Success 200.description: The expiration month number of the credit card.
The expiration year of the credit card.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
    id: 23,
    brand: 'visa',
    last_4: 2345,
    exp_month: "10",
    exp_year: "2029"
  }

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients/locations \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com"

Parameter.description: Latitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Longitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Additional address information for the physical address.

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com" \
  -d latitude=34.047635 \
  -d longitude=-118.463419 \
  -d address="11835 Wilshire Blvd" \
  -d address2="Suite 10" \
  -d city="Santa Monica" \
  -d state="CA" \
  -d zip="90025

Success 200.description: Latitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Longitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Additional address information for the physical address.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
    id: 23,
    latitude: l34.047635,
    longitude: -118.463419,
    address: "1526 14th St",
    address2: "Suite 106",
    city: "Santa Monica",
    state: "CA",
    zip: "90404"
  }

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients/locations/23 \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com"

Success 200.description: Latitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Longitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Additional address information for the physical address.

title: Create
name: CreateMission
description:
One of the things to note about a Mission is that it has a couple dependencies.
The first is a package and the second is a location. See docs for getting the needed ids.

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients/missions \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com"

Parameter.description: This is the start time of the mission. expected format utc iso8601
This is the deadline to complete the mission. expected format utc iso8601

The package id to associate with the mission.
slasdjsadjasldjklasjkldasj
The location id to associate with the mission.
The credit card id to associate with the mission.

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com" \
  -d instructions="Do something cool" \
  -d category="Real Estate" \
  -d start_time="2015-07-03T20:30:37Z" \
  -d end_time="2015-07-17T20:30:37Z" \
  -d package_id=1 \
  -d location_id=23

Success 200.description: Latitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Longitudinal coordinates of the location of the mission.
Additional address information for the physical address.
This is the time of mission creation. times is utc iso8601
Mission status. It can be on of the following ['initialized', x, x]
This is the start time of the mission. times is utc iso8601
This is the deadline to complete the mission. times is utc iso8601
This is the group name for the package.
The is a description of the package. It is written in Markdown.
This is the price of the package. Price is returned in cents.
The location where the mission will be executed
This is the credit card object used to process payment
The expiration month number of the credit card.
The expiration year of the credit card.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
  {
    id: 10022
    status: "initialized",
    instructions: "Do something cool",
    category: "Real Estate",
    start_time: "2015-07-03T20:30:37Z",
    end_time: "2015-07-17T20:30:37Z",
    package: {
      id: 1,
      name: "Pro",
      type_name: "Maps + Surveys",
      description: "  - This is awesomer mapping stuff\n  - You really need this more for excellent mapping\n  - Lets create some cool stuff with this mapper\n",
      price: 59900
    },
    location: {
      id: 23,
      latitude: l34.047635,
      longitude: -118.463419,
      address: "1526 14th St",
      address2: "Suite 106",
      city: "Santa Monica",
      state: "CA",
      zip: "90404"
    },
    credit_card: {
      id: 23,
      type: 'visa'
      last_4: 2345,
      exp_month: "10",
      exp_year: "2029"
    },
    client_id: 27
  }

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/clients/missions \
  -H "Authorization: Token token=bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w, email=larry@dronebase.com"

examples.title: Example:
examples.content:
curl {api-url}/mission/packages \
  -H "X-Api-Token: bTKW0Hmqhq0Ab464vvJe24w"
